nodes.text: Trydara was a location where the TIE fighter pilots of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing attacked Rebel Alliance forces, including at least one X-wing starfighter, who were attempting to flee. One of the pilots was Yrica Quell, who picked off rebels one by one. She was subjected to visions of the fighting by Force energies from an observatory in the Cerberon system around 5 ABY.
Trydara was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
